thread.section_title: Mastershoe Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.mastershoe.co.uk
thread.title: Wendy Jones

author: Wendy Jones
title: Wendy Jones
text: A pair of boots were ordered for my wife with an expected delivery within 3/4 days. They arrived within the expected delivery dates but alas didn't fit. The returns arrangement entailed printing off a returns label, (I had some problems with my printer which delayed my returning them by a day) The refund was received within a couple of days of my sending them, which has to be excellent service. Thank you.
